game.name: Flower Basket Cupcake
game.description:
Hey girls! We would love to invite you to play the world most popular kitchen game: Flower Basket Cupcake. Hope you will have fun together with us and learn a brand new vanilla cupcake recipe shortly. Use your best chef skills to prepare a tasty cupcake, which really looks amazing. Make and enjoy it every day at your home if you have a sweet tooth. You can easily find out all the necessary ingredients in your kitchen to create this recipe in this free online cooking game for girls. 

Keep your eyes on all the important steps and follow them properly in order to achieve the goal of this brand new cooking game. We are sure that you will feel proud on your creations in the end. Prepare this dessert to impress your all friends who are coming at your home today. One of the most important reasons of trying out this summery treat is that flowers are the best thing to express the beauty of the summer season. Pay attention to details and bake some delicious cupcakes. Also decorate your recipe to create a perfect flower basked presentation. 

In the first step of this cute kitchen game, you will have to make the batter by mixing vanilla extract, sugar and butter into a bowl. Now create another mixture in another bowl with the help of flower and baking powder. Then blend these cute mixtures together and also add some milk to it. Take flower printed muffin cups and pour the batter into them. Place them in the oven to bake until it turns into a nice golden color. Create the frosting and spread it on the top of your cupcakes. Use chocolate candy, jellies and black lictorice to make them look like flower baskets. Play it now and have fun a lot in this one of the best cooking games for girls!
